# Royal Palm Beach Concrete Co.

> Professional concrete contractors serving Royal Palm Beach, FL and Palm Beach County

## About

Royal Palm Beach Concrete Co. is a locally owned concrete contracting company serving Royal Palm Beach, Florida and Palm Beach County. We specialize in residential concrete services including driveways, patios, slabs, and decorative stamped concrete.

## Contact

- Phone: (561) 555-0123
- Email: info@royalpalmbeachconcrete.com
- Location: Royal Palm Beach, FL 33411
- Hours: Mon-Fri 7AM-6PM, Sat 8AM-4PM

## Services

- Concrete Driveways: Custom installation, replacement, and repair
- Concrete Patios: Pool decks, entertainment areas, outdoor living spaces
- Concrete Slabs: Foundations, garage floors, shed pads, equipment pads
- Stamped Concrete: Decorative patterns mimicking stone, brick, tile, wood

## Service Areas

We serve all of Palm Beach County including:
- Royal Palm Beach
- Wellington
- West Palm Beach
- Palm Beach Gardens
- Lake Worth
- Greenacres
- Loxahatchee
- Jupiter

## Key Information

- Licensed and insured in Florida
- Free estimates available
- Quality 4,000 PSI concrete used
- Satisfaction guaranteed
- Family owned and operated

## Pricing Guide

- Standard concrete: $8-$12 per square foot
- Stamped concrete: $12-$20 per square foot
- Driveways: $8-$18 per square foot
- Patios: $10-$20 per square foot
- Slabs: $6-$12 per square foot

https://royalpalmbeachconcrete.com
